title: HOUR 2- Sep 28, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Sep 28, 2020
description:
Dan talks about how Doug Peterson's decision to punt the ball and play for a tie rather than go for the win and a possible loss. Dan agrees with Coach Doug today when he said he would do things different looking back on it with clear eyes today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
